# deps liraries compile

unzip the source files from /deps/zip/

1. proj4.

http://proj4.org/projections/index.html

```
./configure
./make
./make install
```


2. GEOS

http://geos.osgeo.org/doxygen/index.html

```
./configure
./make
./make install

```


3. GDAL

```
./configure
./make
./make install

```
